snippet.title: Voice of Belldona - Demo2.0 Trailer
snippet.description:
Download the demo and add to wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2223420/_/

Voice of Belldona weaves a story of swords, magic... and sci-fi! The game features roguelike deck building, Darkest Dungeon-style turn-based combat, elements of JRPG, and a customizable character build system.

Two main characters with very different fighting styles, each with 100+ unique cards, 10+ supporting characters, and a big sandbox map, download the DEMO now and add it to your wish list!

Learn more: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2223420/_/
Join Discord: https://discord.gg/MfE9YvkE9u
FaceBook: https://discord.gg/gbuAFQevN7
